definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: The intellectual heirs of Comte are the contemporary positivists.
sentences.chinese: 孔德的後繼者就是現代的實證論者。

sentences.english: The same motive inspires these writers that inspired Comte.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的動機激發着那些從孔德身上獲得靈感的作家。

sentences.english: Conde positivism is closely related to Fayol theory of management process.
sentences.chinese: 孔德實證主義與法約爾管理過程論是密切相關的。

sentences.english: It stubbornly repeats all the fallacies of Comte.
sentences.chinese: 它倔強地重複着孔德的謬論。

sentences.english: There was a school in Kumjung, and another one in nearby Kunde.
sentences.chinese: 在昆坰有所學校，附近的孔德也有一所。

sentences.english: It is in this sense that Comte repudiates empiricism.
sentences.chinese: 正是從這個意義上說，孔德拋棄了經驗主義。

sentences.english: Awareness of different states that is the Comte proposed.
sentences.chinese: 認識的不同狀態說是孔德提出的。

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher
Rank (name)/Leopold von Ranke (1795-1886), important German historian
surname Aquinas/Thomas Aquinas 托馬斯·阿奎納|托马斯·阿奎纳[Tuo1 ma3 si1 · A1 kui2 na4] (1225-1274)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Russell (name)/Bertrand Arthur William, 3rd Earl Russell (1872-1970), British logician, rationalist philosopher and pacifist
